name: Bunny's Ban
description:
Bunny's Ban is a colorful 3D Puzzle game, navigate the little rabbit and move the objects correctly to put them in the right place, light up all the crystals and solve all the puzzles.

Turn on the lights!






Features

  • 29 Levels in early access
  • Simple Controls
  • Original soundtracks
  • Partial Controller Support
  • Cute and colorful mood
